actions.name: ActivateEvaluationForm
actions.description: Grants permission to activate an evaluation form in the specified Amazon Connect instance. After the evaluation form is activated, it is available to start new evaluations based on the form

actions.name: AssociateApprovedOrigin
actions.description: Grants permission to associate approved origin for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: AssociateBot
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a Lex bot for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: AssociateCustomerProfilesDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a Customer Profiles domain for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: AssociateDefaultVocabulary
actions.description: Grants permission to default vocabulary for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: AssociateInstanceStorageConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to associate instance storage for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: AssociateLambdaFunction
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a Lambda function for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: AssociateLexBot
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a Lex bot for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: AssociatePhoneNumberContactFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to associate contact flow resources to phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: AssociateQueueQuickConnects
actions.description: Grants permission to associate quick connects with a queue in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: AssociateRoutingProfileQueues
actions.description: Grants permission to associate queues with a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: AssociateSecurityKey
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a security key for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: BatchAssociateAnalyticsDataSet
actions.description: Grants permission to grant access and to associate the datasets with the specified AWS account

actions.name: BatchDisassociateAnalyticsDataSet
actions.description: Grants permission to revoke access and to disassociate the datasets with the specified AWS account

actions.name: ClaimPhoneNumber
actions.description: Grants permission to claim phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance or traffic distribution group

actions.name: CreateAgentStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to create agent status in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: CreateContactFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to create a contact flow in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: CreateContactFlowModule
actions.description: Grants permission to create a contact flow module in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: CreateEvaluationForm
actions.description: Grants permission to create an evaluation form in the specified Amazon Connect instance. The form can be used to define questions related to agent performance, and create sections to organize such questions. Question and section identifiers cannot be duplicated within the same evaluation form

actions.name: CreateHoursOfOperation
actions.description: Grants permission to create hours of operation in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: CreateInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: CreateIntegrationAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to create an integration association with an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: CreateParticipant
actions.description: Grants permission to add a participant to an ongoing contact

actions.name: CreatePrompt
actions.description: Grants permission to create a prompt in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: CreateQueue
actions.description: Grants permission to create a queue in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: CreateQuickConnect
actions.description: Grants permission to create a quick connect in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: CreateRoutingProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to create a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: CreateRule
actions.description: Grants permission to create a rule in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: CreateSecurityProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to create a security profile for the specified Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: CreateTaskTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to create a task template in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: CreateTrafficDistributionGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a traffic distribution group

actions.name: CreateUseCase
actions.description: Grants permission to create a use case for an integration association

actions.name: CreateUser
actions.description: Grants permission to create a user for the specified Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: CreateUserHierarchyGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a user hierarchy group in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: CreateVocabulary
actions.description: Grants permission to create a vocabulary in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DeactivateEvaluationForm
actions.description: Grants permission to deactivate an evaluation form in the specified Amazon Connect instance. After a form is deactivated, it is no longer available for users to start new evaluations based on the form

actions.name: DeleteContactEvaluation
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a contact evaluation in the specified Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DeleteContactFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a contact flow in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DeleteContactFlowModule
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a contact flow module in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DeleteEvaluationForm
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an evaluation form in the specified Amazon Connect instance. If the version property is provided, only the specified version of the evaluation form is deleted

actions.name: DeleteHoursOfOperation
actions.description: Grants permission to delete hours of operation in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DeleteInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Connect instance. When you remove an instance, the link to an existing AWS directory is also removed

actions.name: DeleteIntegrationAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an integration association from an Amazon Connect instance. The association must not have any use cases associated with it

actions.name: DeletePrompt
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a prompt in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DeleteQuickConnect
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a quick connect in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DeleteRule
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a rule in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DeleteSecurityProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a security profile in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DeleteTaskTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a task template in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DeleteTrafficDistributionGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a traffic distribution group

actions.name: DeleteUseCase
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a use case from an integration association

actions.name: DeleteUser
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a user in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DeleteUserHierarchyGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a user hierarchy group in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DeleteVocabulary
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a vocabulary in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribeAgentStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to describe agent status in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribeContact
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a contact in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribeContactEvaluation
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a contact evaluation in the specified Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribeContactFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a contact flow in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribeContactFlowModule
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a contact flow module in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribeEvaluationForm
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an evaluation form in the specified Amazon Connect instance. If the version property is not provided, the latest version of the evaluation form is described

actions.name: DescribeForecastingPlanningSchedulingIntegration
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the status of forecasting, planning, and scheduling integration on an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribeHoursOfOperation
actions.description: Grants permission to describe hours of operation in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribeInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to view details of an Amazon Connect instance and is also required to create an instance

actions.name: DescribeInstanceAttribute
actions.description: Grants permission to view the attribute details of an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribeInstanceStorageConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to view the instance storage configuration for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribePhoneNumber
actions.description: Grants permission to describe phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance or traffic distribution group

actions.name: DescribePrompt
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a prompt in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribeQueue
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a queue in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribeQuickConnect
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a quick connect in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribeRoutingProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.description: Grants permission to describe a rule in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.description: Grants permission to describe a security profile in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribeTrafficDistributionGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a traffic distribution group

actions.name: DescribeUser
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a user in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.description: Grants permission to describe a hierarchy group for an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribeUserHierarchyStructure
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the hierarchy structure for an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribeVocabulary
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a vocabulary in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DisassociateApprovedOrigin
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate approved origin for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DisassociateBot
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a Lex bot for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DisassociateCustomerProfilesDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a Customer Profiles domain for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DisassociateInstanceStorageConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate instance storage for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DisassociateLambdaFunction
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a Lambda function for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DisassociateLexBot
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a Lex bot for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DisassociatePhoneNumberContactFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate contact flow resources from phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DisassociateQueueQuickConnects
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate quick connects from a queue in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DisassociateRoutingProfileQueues
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate queues from a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DisassociateSecurityKey
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate the security key for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DismissUserContact
actions.description: Grants permission to dismiss terminated Contact from Agent CCP

actions.name: GetContactAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the contact attributes for the specified contact

actions.name: GetCurrentMetricData
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve current metric data for queues and routing profiles in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: GetCurrentUserData
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve current user data in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: GetFederationToken
actions.description: Grants permission to federate into an Amazon Connect instance when using SAML-based authentication for identity management

actions.name: GetFederationTokens
actions.description: Grants permission to federate into an Amazon Connect instance (Log in for emergency access functionality in the Amazon Connect console)

actions.name: GetMetricData
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve historical metric data for queues in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: GetMetricDataV2
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve metric data in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: GetPromptFile
actions.description: Grants permission to get details about a prompt's presigned Amazon S3 URL in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: GetTaskTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to get details about specified task template in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: GetTrafficDistribution
actions.description: Grants permission to read traffic distribution for a traffic distribution group

actions.name: ListAgentStatuses
actions.description: Grants permission to list agent statuses in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListApprovedOrigins
actions.description: Grants permission to view approved origins of an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListBots
actions.description: Grants permission to view the Lex bots of an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListContactEvaluations
actions.description: Grants permission to list contact evaluations in the specified Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListContactFlowModules
actions.description: Grants permission to list contact flow module resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListContactFlows
actions.description: Grants permission to list contact flow resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListContactReferences
actions.description: Grants permission to list references associated with a contact in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListDefaultVocabularies
actions.description: Grants permission to list default vocabularies associated with a Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListEvaluationFormVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list versions of an evaluation form in the specified Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListEvaluationForms
actions.description: Grants permission to list evaluation forms in the specified Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListHoursOfOperations
actions.description: Grants permission to list hours of operation resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListInstanceAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to view the attributes of an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListInstanceStorageConfigs
actions.description: Grants permission to view storage configurations of an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to view the Amazon Connect instances associated with an AWS account

actions.name: ListIntegrationAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to list summary information about the integration associations for the specified Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListLambdaFunctions
actions.description: Grants permission to view the Lambda functions of an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListLexBots
actions.description: Grants permission to view the Lex bots of an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListPhoneNumbers
actions.description: Grants permission to list phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListPhoneNumbersV2
actions.description: Grants permission to list phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListPrompts
actions.description: Grants permission to list prompt resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.description: Grants permission to list quick connect resources in a queue in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListQueues
actions.description: Grants permission to list queue resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListQuickConnects
actions.description: Grants permission to list quick connect resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListRealtimeContactAnalysisSegments
actions.description: Grants permission to list the analysis segments for a real-time analysis session

actions.name: ListRoutingProfileQueues
actions.description: Grants permission to list queue resources in a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListRoutingProfiles
actions.description: Grants permission to list routing profile resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListRules
actions.description: Grants permission to list rules associated with a Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListSecurityKeys
actions.description: Grants permission to view the security keys of an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListSecurityProfilePermissions
actions.description: Grants permission to list permissions associated with security profile in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListSecurityProfiles
actions.description: Grants permission to list security profile resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for an Amazon Connect resource

actions.name: ListTaskTemplates
actions.description: Grants permission to list task template resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListTrafficDistributionGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to list traffic distribution groups

actions.name: ListUseCases
actions.description: Grants permission to list the use cases of an integration association

actions.name: ListUserHierarchyGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to list the hierarchy group resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListUsers
actions.description: Grants permission to list user resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: MonitorContact
actions.description: Grants permission to monitor an ongoing contact

actions.name: PutUserStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to switch User Status in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ReleasePhoneNumber
actions.description: Grants permission to release phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ReplicateInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to create a replica of an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ResumeContactRecording
actions.description: Grants permission to resume recording for the specified contact

actions.name: SearchAvailablePhoneNumbers
actions.description: Grants permission to search phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance or traffic distribution group

actions.name: SearchQueues
actions.description: Grants permission to search queue resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: SearchRoutingProfiles
actions.description: Grants permission to search routing profile resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: SearchSecurityProfiles
actions.description: Grants permission to search security profile resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: SearchUsers
actions.description: Grants permission to search user resources in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: SearchVocabularies
actions.description: Grants permission to search vocabularies in a Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: StartChatContact
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate a chat using the Amazon Connect API

actions.name: StartContactEvaluation
actions.description: Grants permission to start an empty evaluation in the specified Amazon Connect instance, using the given evaluation form for the particular contact. The evaluation form version used for the contact evaluation corresponds to the currently activated version. If no version is activated for the evaluation form, the contact evaluation cannot be started

actions.name: StartContactRecording
actions.description: Grants permission to start recording for the specified contact

actions.name: StartContactStreaming
actions.description: Grants permission to start chat streaming using the Amazon Connect API

actions.name: StartForecastingPlanningSchedulingIntegration
actions.description: Grants permission to enable forecasting, planning, and scheduling integration on an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: StartOutboundVoiceContact
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate outbound calls using the Amazon Connect API

actions.name: StartTaskContact
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate a task using the Amazon Connect API

actions.name: StopContact
actions.description: Grants permission to stop contacts that were initiated using the Amazon Connect API. If you use this operation on an active contact the contact ends, even if the agent is active on a call with a customer

actions.name: StopContactRecording
actions.description: Grants permission to stop recording for the specified contact

actions.name: StopContactStreaming
actions.description: Grants permission to stop chat streaming using the Amazon Connect API

actions.name: StopForecastingPlanningSchedulingIntegration
actions.description: Grants permission to disable forecasting, planning, and scheduling integration on an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: SubmitContactEvaluation
actions.description: Grants permission to submit a contact evaluation in the specified Amazon Connect instance. Answers included in the request are merged with existing answers for the given evaluation. If no answers or notes are passed, the evaluation is submitted with the existing answers and notes. You can delete an answer or note by passing an empty object ({}) to the question identifier

actions.name: SuspendContactRecording
actions.description: Grants permission to suspend recording for the specified contact

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag an Amazon Connect resource

actions.name: TransferContact
actions.description: Grants permission to transfer the contact to another queue or agent

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to untag an Amazon Connect resource

actions.name: UpdateAgentStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to update agent status in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateContact
actions.description: Grants permission to update a contact in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateContactAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update the contact attributes associated with the specified contact

actions.name: UpdateContactEvaluation
actions.description: Grants permission to update details about a contact evaluation in the specified Amazon Connect instance. A contact evaluation must be in the draft state. Answers included in the request are merged with existing answers for the given evaluation. An answer or note can be deleted by passing an empty object ({}) to the question identifier

actions.name: UpdateContactFlowContent
actions.description: Grants permission to update contact flow content in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateContactFlowMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to update the metadata of a contact flow in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateContactFlowModuleContent
actions.description: Grants permission to update contact flow module content in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateContactFlowModuleMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to update the metadata of a contact flow module in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateContactFlowName
actions.description: Grants permission to update the name and description of a contact flow in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateContactSchedule
actions.description: Grants permission to update the schedule of a contact that is already scheduled in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateEvaluationForm
actions.description: Grants permission to update details about a specific evaluation form version in the specified Amazon Connect instance. Question and section identifiers cannot be duplicated within the same evaluation form

actions.name: UpdateHoursOfOperation
actions.description: Grants permission to update hours of operation in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateInstanceAttribute
actions.description: Grants permission to update the attribute for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateInstanceStorageConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update the storage configuration for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateParticipantRoleConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update participant role configurations associated with a contact

actions.name: UpdatePhoneNumber
actions.description: Grants permission to update phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance or traffic distribution group

actions.name: UpdatePrompt
actions.description: Grants permission to update a prompt's name, description, and Amazon S3 URI in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateQueueHoursOfOperation
actions.description: Grants permission to update queue hours of operation in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateQueueMaxContacts
actions.description: Grants permission to update queue capacity in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateQueueName
actions.description: Grants permission to update a queue name and description in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateQueueOutboundCallerConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update queue outbound caller config in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateQueueStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to update queue status in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateQuickConnectConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of a quick connect in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateQuickConnectName
actions.description: Grants permission to update a quick connect name and description in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateRoutingProfileConcurrency
actions.description: Grants permission to update the concurrency in a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateRoutingProfileDefaultOutboundQueue
actions.description: Grants permission to update the outbound queue in a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateRoutingProfileName
actions.description: Grants permission to update a routing profile name and description in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateRoutingProfileQueues
actions.description: Grants permission to update the queues in routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateRule
actions.description: Grants permission to update a rule for an existing Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateSecurityProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to update a security profile group for a user in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateTaskTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to update task template belonging to a Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateTrafficDistribution
actions.description: Grants permission to update traffic distribution for a traffic distribution group

actions.name: UpdateUserHierarchy
actions.description: Grants permission to update a hierarchy group for a user in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateUserHierarchyGroupName
actions.description: Grants permission to update a user hierarchy group name in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateUserHierarchyStructure
actions.description: Grants permission to update user hierarchy structure in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateUserIdentityInfo
actions.description: Grants permission to update identity information for a user in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateUserPhoneConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update phone configuration settings for a user in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateUserRoutingProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to update a routing profile for a user in an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: UpdateUserSecurityProfiles
actions.description: Grants permission to update security profiles for a user in an Amazon Connect instance
